message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $115. I think it's a fair price considering its value to you. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I am willing to pay $105 for the product. I hope this aligns with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $105 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down a little, but $110 is the lowest I can go. Let me know if you're interested.
Hello Alice, thank you for your follow-up offer. I understand your position, but I am still unable to meet at $110. I am prepared to offer $107 for the product. I hope this proposal works for you.
